5 years of Lido.

Lido launched with a mission to provide Ethereum users with access to simple, secure & decentralised staking.

With 8,700,000 ETH staked across 800+ node operators and +33% of stETH used across DeFi, this amounts to a resounding success.

üéÇ 
Lido went live on December 19th, 2020.

At the time, Ethereum staking was complex and inaccessible to most users.

Hundreds of thousands of users and billions of dollars in staking rewards later, Lido has evolved into a core part of the Ethereum ecosystem.
The Lido Journey

2020
‚Ä¢ Lido launched publicly in December, introducing liquid staking as a way to earn ETH staking rewards without running infrastructure or sacrificing liquidity.

2021
‚Ä¢ Surpassed $1B in total value staked within four months, validating liquid staking as a core primitive for Ethereum.

2022
‚Ä¢ Lido V2 was announced, laying the foundation for long-term evolution through the Staking Router, Withdrawals, and Dual Governance.
‚Ä¢ stETH became deeply integrated across DeFi, including @aave, @SkyEcosystem, @CurveFinance, and @yearnfi, establishing it as a foundational asset in onchain finance.

2023
‚Ä¢ Lido V2 launched following Ethereum‚Äôs transition to Proof of Stake.
‚Ä¢ Lido expanded beyond mainnet with native wstETH deployments across key L2s.

2024
‚Ä¢ Simple DVT Module introduced, accelerating mainnet adoption of Distributed Validator Technology via @Obol_Collective and @ssv_network.
‚Ä¢ Community Staking Module (CSM) went from testnet to mainnet, enabling permissionless entry for node operators and increasing validator diversity.

2025
‚Ä¢ Lido V3 was announced, paving the way for modular staking infrastructure built around stVaults.
‚Ä¢ Dual Governance was activated, aligning LDO governance with stETH holders to balance protocol decision-making.
‚Ä¢ CSM v2 launched, introducing Identified Community Stakers and further strengthening decentralization at the validator layer.
‚Ä¢ WisdomTree launched the first fully staked ETH ETP, backed by stETH.
The work is far from done.

With ongoing decentralization efforts, Lido V3 introducing new staking primitives and new institutional pathways for stETH exposure, Lido is expanding beyond a single product into modular staking infrastructure.
To the stakers, node operators, contributors, builders, and Ethereum community members who have helped shape Lido over the past five years ‚Äì thank you.

Here's to 5 more years ü•Ç

I'm bearish on $ETH  üñê üòé Guys, this is my final piece of advice on selling.  From September 2024 up to today, with $100,000 of borrowed money secured by my apartment and 1,000 $ in my pocket, generously lent by friends, I made $167 million by aggressively shorting BTC, SOLANA, and ETH.   I helped many people become dollar millionaires. But the time has come to pull money off crypto exchanges and hide it in other assets, far away from the banks of Europe and the United States.   I‚Äôd like to wish you success in the New Year, but looking at things realistically, it won‚Äôt help you.  Statistics say 99% of investors lose everything within five years.   I want to live the rest of my life as a dollar millionaire ‚Äî not return to my old life.   The crypto market crash in 2026 is inevitable.  Major funds and companies ‚Äî MicroStrategy, Oracle, BlackRock ‚Äî will be the first to fall.  Binance, Bybit, BingX will fade into the sunset.   I‚Äôd like to hope for the best, but unfortunately all indicators point not to a correction, but to the collapse of the entire crypto industry and the stock market.   This life has a code.  Not kindness.  Not mercy.  Laws are written for the weak.  If you want to survive ‚Äî become the law for others.   Who are you?  A predator or prey?  The one who cuts,  or the one who bleeds?  If you‚Äôre not a predator,  then you‚Äôre prey.
